message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I really appreciate it. However, $110 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable spending right now.  I'm willing to pay $105.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $110 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $107.50. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
